title: Job hunters are putting their vaccination status on LinkedIn and résumés. Should you do the same?
text:
House Democrats plan EV tax credits of up to $12,500, as Republicans, Tesla, Toyota voice objections

The Democratic-run House Ways and Means Committee's proposals for a $3.5 trillion spending package include new tax credits for electric vehicles, as Washington continues to push for a shift away from gasoline-powered cars. See full story.

AMC's deeper move into crypto cements Adam Aron as ‘King Silverback' of meme stocks

The movie theater will now accept 5 coins as payment, which is less about crypto than it is about Aron and his retail shareholders. See full story.

Even as interest rates tread water, the housing market could get a second wind

For over two months now, interest rates have barely budged, remaining well below 3%. See full story.

I'm a 75-year-old financially secure widow. Would it be a mistake to move in with my daughter and son-in-law?

'My daughter wants to build a home with two master suites. I have more than enough money for a down payment.' See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

A fundraising campaign ending next February has brought in more than $31 million for St. Jude hospital, on top of billionaire Jared Isaacman's $100 million pledge. See full story.
